ValidationRule.description: When an Oppty is Closed Won and it has a GM deal then the user must complete GlobalMeet Details
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "PGi Opportunity", $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", CONTAINS(TEXT(StageName), "Closed Won")|| ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Pending Approval"), ISPICKVAL( GM_Version__c,""), OR( Opportunity_Product_Families__c = "Web: GlobalMeet", Opportunity_Product_Families__c = "Conversion Project") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When closing an Opportunity with GM products, you must advise which GM Version is being sold.
